description:
1.Love is ever matter of comedies, and how and then of tragedies. 

爱情常是喜剧，偶尔是悲剧。

2.Human nature is so constructed that it gives affection most readily to those who seem least to demand it. 

人的天性就是如此，他最乐意将爱给予那些似乎最不强求爱的人。

3.For you see, each day I love you more. Today more than yesterday and less than tomorrow.

你知道吗?我每天都爱你更多。今天爱的比昨天多，明天爱的比今天多。

4.You know you're in love when you don't want to fall asleep because reality is finally better than your dreams.

当你终于因为现实比梦境更美而无法入睡时，你恋爱了。

5.First impression of you is most lasting.

对你最初的印象，久久难以忘怀。

6.Never frown, even when you are sad, because you never know who is falling in love with your smile.

纵然伤心，也不要愁眉不展，因为你不知是谁会爱上你的笑容。

7.As selfishness and complaint cloud the mind, so love with its joy clears and sharpens the vision. 

自私和抱怨是心灵阴暗，愉悦的爱则使视野明朗开阔。

8.As selfishness and complaint cloud the mind, so love with its joy clears and sharpens the vision.

自私和抱怨是心灵阴暗，愉悦的爱则使视野明朗开阔。

9.I feel happy at times we have had angry words but these have been kissed away.

我们生气争执时，爱的双唇把它们吻得无影无踪，我的心也顿觉甜蜜。

10. Never frown, even when you are sad, because you never know who is falling in love with your smile.

纵然伤心，也不要愁眉不展，因为你不知是谁会爱上你的笑容。

title: 英语爱情名言：爱情常是喜剧

description:
1All love is sweet, given or returned. common as light is loved, and its familiar voice wearies not ever. 

所有的爱都是甜蜜的，无论是给予还是回报。爱就像阳光一样无所不在，他那熟悉的嗓音永远不会消沉。

2.When success comes in the door, it seems, love often goes out the window. 

成功来到门前时，爱情往往就走出了窗外。

3.love is ever matter of comedies, and how and then of tragedies. 

爱情常是喜剧，偶尔是悲剧。

4.Love is not a matter of counting the days. It's making the days count.

爱情不是数着日子过去，它让每个日子都变得有意义。

5.First impression of you is most lasting.

对你最初的印象，久久难以忘怀。

6.Never frown, even when you are sad, because you never know who is falling in love with your smile.

纵然伤心，也不要愁眉不展，因为你不知是谁会爱上你的笑容。

7.Your kiss still burns on my lips, everyday of mine is so beautiful.

你的吻还在我的唇上发烫，从此我的日子变得如此美丽。

8.Don’t try so hard, the best things come when you least expect them to. 　

不要着急，最好的总会在最不经意的时候出现。

9.I feel happy at times we have had angry words but these have been kissed away.

我们生气争执时，爱的双唇把它们吻得无影无踪，我的心也顿觉甜蜜。

10.Men are april when they woo,december when they wed;maids are may when they are maids,but the sky changes when they are wives.

男人求婚时像四月天，婚后像十二月天；女人少女时像五月天，为人妻后就变天。

title: 英语爱情名言：所有的爱都是甜蜜的

description:
1.He was my North, my South, my East and West, My working week and my Sunday rest, My noon, my midnight, my talk, my song; I thought that love would last forever: I was wrong.

他是我的南北，我的西东。是我作息的意义。是我的日夜，欢唱谈话的内容。我以为爱会永恒不朽……我错了。

2.Friendship is like earthenware: once broken, it can be mended; love is like a mirror: once broken, that ends it.

友谊就像陶器，破了可以修补；爱情好比镜子，一旦打破就难重圆。

3.Whatever our souls are made of, his and mine are the same.　

不论我们的灵魂是什么做成的，他的和我的是一模一样的。

4. First impression of you is most lasting.

对你最初的印象，久久难以忘怀。

5.Love is a fabric that nature wove and fantasy embroidered.

爱情是一方织巾，用自然编织，用幻想点缀。

6.Present's you, whether to have made past dream.

现在的你，是否做过从前的梦。

7. If you are well, is cloudless day

你若安好,便是晴天。

8.I love you, looks like you not to love my same firmness.

我爱你，就像你不爱我一样的坚决。

9. I in and so on future. will have your future.

我在等未来。有你的未来。

10.You stand in the time, blurred my belief

你站在时光里,模糊了我的信仰
